title: Freshservice Portal Access
description: How to activate and login to the Freshservice ticketing system.

steps.title: Login Initiation
steps.instruction: Click on the 'Login' button at the top right.

steps.title: Activate Account
steps.instruction: Check your email for an activation link and follow the instructions to activate your account.

steps.title: Set Password
steps.instruction: Create a secure password and login to start raising tickets.
